title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.21 - Surveillance/security functionality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.21 - Surveillance/security functionality

State Regulations
A MCS shall provide an interrogation program that enables
online comprehensive searching of the significant event log for the current day
and for the previous 14 days through archived data or restoration from backup
where maintaining such data on a live database is deemed inappropriate. The
interrogation program shall have the ability to perform a search based at least
on the following: (a) date and time
range; (b) unique interface
element/gaming device identification number; or
(c) significant event
number/identifier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.21

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
